Package network

Class MyDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.MyDataBase
  • public class MyDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    A class connecting the server to the database. Created as Singleton.

      • addGuest

        public void addGuest​(Guest guest)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used to add a guest to the database. If the database already contains a guest with the same phone number, nothing will be added.
        Parameters:
        guest - the guest to be added.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • editRoomInfo

        public void editRoomInfo​(java.lang.String roomID,
                         RoomType type,
                         int nrBeds,
                         int price)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method used for editing information about a room in
        Parameters:
        roomID - the ID of the room to be edited.
        type - the new type to be assigned to the room.
        nrBeds - The new number of beds to be assigned to the room.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if room is able to be edited.
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllRoomBookings

        public java.util.ArrayList<RoomBooking> getAllRoomBookings​(java.lang.String type)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method returning an ArrayList of RoomBooking objects whose contents depend on the argument.
        Parameters:
        type - What type of bookings to get. The following options are valid: "" (an empty string) returns all bookings from the database. "booked" returns all bookings that is currently in a booked state. "inProgress" returns all bookings that is currently in an in progress state. "cancelled" returns all bookings that have been cancelled. "archived" returns all bookings that have been archived.
        Returns:
        An arrayList of RoomBooking objects with state specified by the argument.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
